subject: Collection of Samples from Site during site visit/ inspection of GM/ CGM; HQ & getting the samples tested at HQ through Quality Division
text: HRa 7q rTHNf giferasrot (Tew5 9Rar &lr RTHNf #A4, IRG FRGR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) &7444 TR #-5 & 6, 842/-10, #Rqal, # @crlt 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 TI/Phone 91-11-25074100 25074200 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/ Quality Assurance/2023 Policy Circular No.15.11/ 2023 dated 1Oth November , 2023 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAIISRDQ/223/2023 (Comp. No. 225800)} Sub: Collection of Samples from Site during site visit/  inspection of GW CGM, HQ & getting the samples tested at HQ through Quality Division -reg: NHAI has entered into an MoU on 02.11.2023 with Shriram Institute for Industrial Research, New Delhi for: (i) Quality assessment of road construction material including collection & testing of samples; (ii) Analytical services of structures including NDT , calibration of measuring instruments & equipment, quality control and quality assurance, validation methods, method development, innovations in various areas of research including product and process development and process upscaling; (iii) Training in quality tests/ systems/ methods, setting up of labs/ accreditation centers. 2  GM(T)/ CGM(T) at HQ shall collect the samples of major ongoing works during their site visits/ inspections and send them to Quality Division at HQ for getting them tested from Shriram Institute. 3 The above samples shall be properly sealed following the due procedure, i.e., in the presence of Contractors/ Concessionaires and AE/ IE Representatives. 4 Quality Division will send the test reports to respective PIUs/ ROs, who in turn will take timely action on the reports and inspecting officers [GM(T)/ CGM(T) at HQ] shall oversee the actions being taken on the reports: 5. The charges for above testing shall be borne by respective PIU and PIU shall make prompt payment to Shriram Institute within 07 days of raising of invoice, forwarded by Quality Division. 6_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority: "l23 (Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord.) To: All Officers of NHAI HQ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1_ Hindi Division for translation in Hindi. 2 Library for hosting the circular on library site: 3 Web Admin for circulation.
